scenario_text.value:
Oh, Takuma! The walls in here have lots of
drawings too!

Yeah, they do. And there’s another huge mural
covering the whole wall...

Incredible! This mural is like nothing else
I’ve ever seen!

This passage leads to the lowest level, where
Miyuki and the Master are waiting.
I hope you’re all ready for this.

Oh, you know we are. I can’t wait to smash
this stupid Master’s face in!

Kaito! We need to bring Aoi back to her
senses and save Miyuki first!
Anyway, this is where things get serious!

We’re both prepared to fight as well. However
hard things get, we’ll triumph in the end.

Yeah. We’re ready for anything, even if the
worst happens.

Let’s hope for the best, though! I’m sure we
can find a way to end this right.

All right, brace yourselves, everyone, and
follow me.
